VoiceList.Entry: Barret “The rest is up to you!”
Tifa “Please take me with you. You're going after Sephiroth,aren't you?”
Tifa “I've lost a lot because of Sephiroth too. So please take me along.”
Tifa “I've lost a lot because of Sephiroth.”
Red XIII “I'm going to call everyone.”
Cid “Man,I sure am thankful. Wanna rest a while?”
Yuffie “Are you saying you don't like me?”
Cait Sith “I'll gather everybody, so you go on ahead.”
Vincent “Keep on your guard… Sephiroth may be near.”
